entry.title: Pashinyan discusses Karabakh blockade with Putin, UN chief

media:group.media:title: Pashinyan discusses Karabakh blockade with Putin, UN chief
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan held separate phone calls with Russian President Vladimir Putin and United Nations Secretary-General Ant√≥nio Guterres to discuss Azerbaijan‚Äôs blockade of Karabakh. üìçU.S. State Department spokesperson Ned Price again said negotiating teams from Armenia and Azerbaijan may hold another round of talks in Brussels, but added that there is no meeting scheduled at present. üìçFormer Armenian Foreign Minister Vartan Oskanian warned against Armenia‚Äôs possible recognition of Karabakh as part of Azerbaijan.
